activities:
CFGI is a financial consulting firm, which offers companies “Big Four” accounting resources free from the restrictions of Auditor Independence. CFGI advises its clients on a variety of complex accounting, reporting, and tax issues. Our firm’s professionals have extensive experience and operate in the following lines of service:   
» Consulting
» Interim Management
» Corporate Tax
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
